channel.title: Few things :)
channel.description:
So i have a few things i was wondering if anyone knew how to edit
[s]1.)[/s] [s]I want to add a donator class and make dragon claws donator only.[/s] [s] 2.) The catherby teleport currently takes you to catherby. I would like to change it to my skilling area.[/s]
3.) I want to add a jail in the crafting guild so they cannot leave until someone ::unjails them and they cannot tele, drop or trade when they are in jail....
[s]4.) A ::noclip command for owners only. for some reason i dont have one...[/s]
I know its alot but I am still learning. I do have some knowledge but take it easy on me please.

item.title: Few things :)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Yea, you can add players manually, or you can add them using the methods I supplied inside the class, and to check the donators you just use

server.donators.isDonator("playerName")

Example:

if (server.donators.isDonator("X Blitz X")) {
    System.out.println("Donator");
} else {
    System.out.println("Not Donator :(");
}

item.title: Few things :)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Open a new TXT file, then add in this,

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.DataInputStream;
import java.io.File;
import java.io.FileInputStream;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.PrintWriter;

import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

public class Donator {
    public List<String> donatorList;
    public BufferedReader reader;

    public Donator() {
    	donatorList = new ArrayList<String>();
    	refreshDonatorList();
    }
    
    public boolean isDonator(String playerName) {
        return donatorList.contains(playerName);
    }
    
    public void refreshDonatorList() {
    	donatorList.clear();
    	try {
    		DataInputStream in = new DataInputStream(new FileInputStream("./data/Donators.txt"));
    		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(in));
    	    
    		String strLine;
    		while ((strLine = br.readLine()) != null)   {
    			donatorList.add(strLine);
    		}
    		in.close();
    	} catch (FileNotFoundException e){
    		System.err.println("File Not Found, make sure ./data/Donators.txt exists.");
    	} catch(IOException e) {
    		System.err.println("Error: " + e.getMessage());
    	}
    }
    
    public void addDonator(String playerName) {
    	try {
                BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./data/Donators.txt", true));
                bw.write(playerName);
                bw.close();
			
                refreshDonatorList();
    	} catch (IOException e) {
	        e.printStackTrace();
	}
    }
    
    public void removeDonator(String playerName) {
    	try {
    		File inFile = new File("./data/Donators.txt");
    		File tempFile = new File(inFile.getAbsolutePath() + ".tmp");
    		      
    		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/Donators.txt"));
    		PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(new FileWriter(tempFile));
    		      
    		String line = null;
    		while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
    			if (!line.trim().equals(playerName)) {
    				pw.println(line);
    		        pw.flush();
    		    }
    		}
    		pw.close();
    		br.close();
    		      
    		inFile.delete();
    		tempFile.renameTo(inFile);
    		
    		refreshDonatorList();
    	} catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
    		ex.printStackTrace();
    	} catch (IOException ex) {
    		ex.printStackTrace();
    	}
    }
}

Then go to, File -> Save As

Then type, Donator.java

Edit: Attached a picture

Read full topic

item.title: Few things :)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“Girona, post:15, topic:279907”][quote author=Girona link=topic=369357.msg2795995#msg2795995 date=1243077433]
Bmaw, it should add a new line in your character file such as

Donator = *

0 is for no donator, and 1 is for donator.
[/quote]
Sorry if I’m wrong, I haven’t bothered to read any pasted code in here.[/quote]
You’re wrong, lol, it loads all the players listed in the file /data/Donators.txt then loads them into a List, then when you call the method

donators.isDonator("playername");

It checks for that player name in the list, if the player is found then the player is a donator, otherwise the player isn’t.

donators.removeDonator("playerName");

Removes the donator from the text file then refreshes the list.

donator.addDonator("playerName");

Adds a new donator into the text file and then refreshes the list.

Read full topic

item.title: Few things :)
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Bmaw:

Where do i add it and what rights is it for donator

Add it in a new file called Donator.java,

then add this in the Server class

Donator donators = new Donator();

Then you can use,

donators.isDonator("enter player name here");
// Checks if the player is a donator.
donators.removeDonator("enter player name here");
donators.addDonator("enter player name here");

[quote=“Girona, post:13, topic:279907”]Eek. The mighty X Blitz X doesn’t post much anymore!

Bmaw, you don’t need a noclip command just use ::tele (in 80% of the servers going around)

Bmaw, it should add a new line in your character file such as

Donator = *

0 is for no donator, and 1 is for donator.[/quote]

Read full topic
